Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Holy Great Fast

Text.Language: Amwini n~tenern/cteuin: n~hann/ctia etj/k e~bol: hiten pis~l/l nem ]n/ctia: n~te P[oic ,w nan e~bol.
Come let us fast, perfect fasts, through prayer and fasting, the Lord will forgive us.
